channel.title: PORTFOLIO on Yuri
channel.description: Recent content in PORTFOLIO on Yuri

item.title: Defect Prediction in Truck Air Systems
item.description: Project Overview In this project, data science techniques were applied to optimize the maintenance planning for a transportation company’s truck fleet, specifically focusing on the air system. Approach 1.Data Analysis and Preprocessing: The data related to truck air system maintenance was analyzed and preprocessed. This included handling encoded columns and missing data to ensure the dataset was clean and suitable for modeling. 2.Model Training and Evaluation: Various machine learning models were used to predict air system failures, including Random Forest, Gradient Boosting, and Naive Bayes.

item.title: Customer and Product Analysis using SQL
item.description: The database analysis was carried out using the DB Browser for SQLite to answer three questions about products and costumers.

item.title: Spam Filter Project
item.description: In this project, we’re going to create a spam filter that classifies new messages with an accuracy greater than 80% — so we expect that more than 80% of the new messages will be classified correctly as spam or ham(non-spam). To do that, we’ll use the multinomial Naive Bayes algorithm along with a dataset of 5,572 SMS messages that are already classified by humans.

item.title: Advertising Project
item.description: This project analyzes an e-learning company that wants to promote one of its products by investing in advertising. We will thoroughly analyze the e-learning market and develop a targeted advertising campaign to achieve this goal. The company provided data from a survey where users of its platform informed personal data, goals, and availability to purchase products. The task is to define the best markets to invest in advertising.

item.title: Russian Currency Project
item.description: An analysis was carried out using Russia’s exchange rate data to assess how the country’s economy behaves in times of international conflict. In this project we use Pandas and Matoplotlib to analyze our data and create an image that tells their story.
